text: Jack Nicholson and Kiefer Sutherland were the only good things about that whole damned film.

name: tombsgrave
text: So much, said with so much scooting.

name: zedpower
text: I wish I could try that. But if I did, the roomba would probably spin its little motor in a way that sounded like "fuck you", and then it would die.

text: It even makes the last notes sound like "Y O U R F A U L T"

name: anticitizen
text:
ENTERING DEATH MODE.

WHAT DID YOU DO?

name: dybrar
text:
YOU STEP ON ME

YOU BRING THE PAIN

text:

YOU STEP TO ME

text: I did, in fact, not.

name: terriblerobot
text:
Oh. Well. This is awkward.

Carry on.

name: jackparsons
text: All Roombas get stepped on. They have a special battery that costs $50 on the black market I mean Ebay. So people put them in the closet and say, "I'll sell the battery on Ebay someday".

name: rowboat
text: I get the feeling that it's borrowed from something else, but I must say that the way panels 3-6 convey Teodor's motion are brilliant.

name: molesticide
text: i like the clean spot in the rug left in his wake

name: canusdivinus
text: Didn't even notice that before. Onstad doesn't leave shit out...

name: smilebuddha
text: It could also be the nap of the carpet, having been pushed in one direction opposed to the random carpet distribution of oh my god why am I typing this ...

name: rowboat
text:
Probably because the 11/1/08 strip hasn't been updated in a week and a half your computer barely even loads it any more and today is your day off because you have a government job but it's cold and rainy as hell and all of your friends have regular jobs and so have to work anyway and you're bored as hell and just want to comment somewhere and this seemed like a good enough place but now you're starting to wonder if you should be doing something else anyway and you see the dishes need doing but that seems so depressing and that's why you typed it.

Oh, never mind. That's me.

name: smilebuddha
text: Well, more to the point, I'm gettin' through the archive, bit by bit, limb by limb. ( cue Cutty Ranks )
